channel.title: Posts on Shuangke's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shuangke's website

item.title: 我的第一篇博客
item.description: Step1: install Hugo Step2: create a new site hugo new site siteName Step3: add a theme cd siteName git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml Step 4: Add Some Content hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Step 5: Start the Hugo server hogo sever -D Step 6: Customize the Theme baseURL = "https://example.org/" languageCode = "en-us" title = "My New Hugo Site" theme = "ananke" Step 7: Build static pages –> public folder hugo Step8: put public and site into different local repo add .
